MIME element (text/plain) 
GCC: ICC Cricket World Cup 2007 infringements- ICC_NRID14799 
 
 
NetResult Internal Reference:  ICC_NRID14799 
 
 
Please quote the above ICC_NRID14799  reference in all communications with us
regarding this issue. 
 
 
Dear Sirs, 
 
We write on behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket
Corporation Pte Limited who together own and control the worldwide broadcast rights
for the ICC Cricket World Cup 2007. 
  
We have noticed that your website, http://www.webdesigningdelhi.com is displaying,
promoting and/or offering audio, visual and/or audio-visual content from the ICC
Cricket World Cup 2007. This content includes illegal streams located either on
other servers or on peer-to-peer (P2P) type software. All copyright in such images
vest with ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte
Limited. 
 
As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from the ICC Development
(International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited to use this
content, your present use is an infringement of the ICC Development (International)
Limited's and Global Cricket Corporation Pte LimitedÃ¯Â¿Â½s rights.  
 
Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your web sites and
confirm to us via email that you have done so. 
 
Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an express or
implied waiver of any of ICC Development (International) Limited's and Global
Cricket Corporation Pte Limited's rights or remedies, including any rights or
remedies in respect of infringement not explicitly stated, whether current or in the
future, all of which are expressly reserved.    
 
 
 
Formal Declaration 
 
I hereby state that ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket
Corporation Pte Limited are the owners and controllers of the exclusive rights to
the audio, visual and/or audio-visual content referenced above and that NetResult is
authorized to act on behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global
Cricket Corporation Pte Limited with respect to internet monitoring and compliance
related to infringement of such rights. 
 
 
On behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation
Pte Limited, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of such A/V
content in the manner complained of is not authorized by ICC Development
(International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited, its agents, or
the law. 
 
I, Sebastian Taylor, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign  this
e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of
America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury that the information
in the notice is accurate. 
 
We thank you for your timely and full cooperation 
 
 
Yours sincerely, 
          Sebastian Taylor 
 
NetResult 
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd 
Mulberry House 
583 Fulham Road 
London 
UK SW6 5UA 
 
 
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB 
 
Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please 
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail 
immediately to the correct person or department for action.
